snippet.title: Sonic: Hellfire Saga (Final Release) ✪ Full Game Playthrough (1080p/60fps)
snippet.description:
Hellfire Saga is a Rom Modification of Sonic 3 & Knuckles created by Red Miso Studios.
#sonic3andknuckles #sonicromhacks

Story:Sonic finds his realm transformed, merging with the demon realm to form a nightmarish scape littered with legions of hungry-for-blood demons. Help Sonic to escape from hell and return to his home world!

-
The game has gone from an amateur little Sonic 3 and Knuckles modification to a full-fledged game project with a development history worthy of a whole book, with lots of time dedicated to the concept, development, audio and visuals.

Explore from 9 long length filled acts of infernal mayhem with exciting new boss battles awaiting, along with an impressively made final boss battle. Plus, you can choose from over 4 different difficulties of Assist (Easy), Normal, Hard, and Maniac.

-

This actually caught me by surprise when I heard the game came out with it's final release just yesterday so I instantly wanted to get right into checking this out.

= Quick Note =
The soundtrack that was used in the ending apparently had a claim so I had to mute it in advance.

‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒

⏱️ 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗺𝗽𝘀
0:00 - Intro 
0:15 - Title & Options

1:32 - Forest of Decay Stage 1
7:00 - Forest of Decay Stage 2
10:35 - Forest of Decay Stage 3

13:39 - Sin City Stage 1
19:42 - Sin City Stage 2
25:47 - Sin City Stage 3

31:01 - Malicious Glance Stage 1
37:12 - Malicious Glance Stage 2
42:45 - Malicious Glance Stage 3

45:51 - Devil's Descent (Final Boss - Phase 1)
48:17 - Devil's Descent (Final Boss - Phase 2)

52:44 - Ending
53:32 - Credits Zone

57:48 - Outro

‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒

✪ Sonic Modified Roms Playlist ✪
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTbxUzzstrYchPEC7a8xLezMLPX0n8fpu

‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒ ‒

✪ Link is here! ✪
Hellfire Saga (by Red Miso Studios):
https://redmiso.studio/roms/HellfireSaga_Final_30_01_23.gen
